Name: The Wet Spot
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini (large 10oz) glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Adapted from a drink created by Willy Shine and Aisha Sharpe at Bed Bar, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of The Wet Spot contains 221 calories
